content: i designed this hat when participating to a kal about halloween mc orange chanteleine 79 approx 130 yds/120 m cc1 black bergeronnette approx 153 yds/140 m cc2 and cc3 orange idéal approx 16 yds/15 m of each **2014 april 6 / 3rd edition** the pattern has been entirely rewrited the layout has been changed the instructions are for the orange hat only the green hat in the pattern is only a picture there is no direction to work it please note that **in the first edition** before 2008 november 16th the first round of the body has to be worked in knit sts and not in purl sts you should read work 1 round in knit st using black yarn and us 4/3 5 mm circular needle increasing 16 sts in the round * k7 yo k8 yo * around **in the second edition** 2009 aug 10th there is a correction for the shaping before working one row in black you have to decrease from 91 sts to 78 sts see the pattern -thanks lani 1 the **current downloadable file** from ravelry is right téléchargement de la version française sur ravelry ou sur créations on line 2 1 http //www ravelry com/people/lanigf 2 http //onlinepatterns canalblog com/archives/2008/10/01/10781718 html
